attributes.action: why do us over 65 yrs have to pay over £42.00 to have one tooth removed. when we only had to pay £15.00 before .we have paid into NHS for over 50yrs. it should be free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as O.A.P we shuld get our dental for free. not pay dentst over 42.00 for less than five mins.work
